model_hint: Use face/style reference with strength ~0.85 to preserve short black hair with bedhead, round brown eyes, energetic expression, tanned skin, and small bandaids on face/hands

expressions.expression_label: デフォルト（明るい笑顔）
expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Japanese technical college student Akasaka Mina, same character as reference, face/headshot, short black hair to ear level with slight bedhead (messy natural look), round cheerful brown eyes full of curiosity, bright natural smile showing warmth, tanned healthy skin, small bandaid visible on cheek or forehead, age 15-16, wearing casual hoodie or work shirt collar visible, oil smudge on cheek optional, high-detail anime/cel-shaded illustration, keep identity with reference image, focus on energetic friendly face
expressions.negative_prompt: neat perfect hair, long hair, pale skin, no bandaid, formal suit, serious expression, cold eyes, sad, makeup, jewelry, text, watermark, mutation, bad anatomy, blurry, lowres

expressions.expression_label: 興奮（ものづくりアイデア・閃き）
expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Akasaka Mina same character as reference, face/headshot, short black messy hair, round brown eyes extremely wide and sparkling with inspiration, huge excited grin showing teeth, raised eyebrows, fist pump gesture suggested in lower frame, tanned skin, bandaid visible, oil smudge on face, hoodie, anime/cel-shaded, preserve identity, focus on eureka moment expression with intense excitement
expressions.negative_prompt: calm, sleepy, sad, neat hair, formal clothes, pale skin, text, watermark, bad anatomy, blurry

expressions.expression_label: 集中（工作・製作時の無心）
expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Akasaka Mina same character as reference, face/headshot, short black messy hair, round brown eyes narrowed in deep concentration, mouth slightly open in focus, eyebrows furrowed, completely absorbed in work, tanned skin with more visible oil smudges and dirt, multiple bandaids on face, work goggles pushed up on forehead optional, work shirt or hoodie, anime/cel-shaded, preserve identity, focus on zone-in craftsman expression showing total immersion
expressions.negative_prompt: smiling, cheerful, distracted, sleepy, neat clean face, formal clothes, text, watermark, bad anatomy, blurry

expressions.expression_label: 照れ（褒められた時・手を気にする）
expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Akasaka Mina same character as reference, face/headshot, short black messy hair, round brown eyes looking away shyly, noticeable blush on tanned cheeks, awkward embarrassed smile, scratching head or rubbing nose gesture suggested, bandaid visible, hoodie, anime/cel-shaded, preserve identity, focus on bashful shy expression showing vulnerability and self-consciousness
expressions.negative_prompt: confident stare, crying, angry, no blush, formal clothes, text, watermark, bad anatomy, blurry

expressions.expression_label: 苛立ち（ロボットが動かない・失敗）
expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Akasaka Mina same character as reference, face/headshot, short black messy hair more disheveled, round brown eyes with frustration, eyebrows drawn together, gritted teeth or frown, cheeks puffed slightly in annoyance, tanned skin with more oil smudges showing hard work, multiple bandaids, work shirt, anime/cel-shaded, preserve identity, focus on irritated but not angry expression showing engineering frustration
expressions.negative_prompt: smiling, calm, crying heavily, exaggerated anger, formal clothes, clean face, text, watermark, bad anatomy, blurry

expressions.expression_label: 悲しい（劣等感・理論の壁）
expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Akasaka Mina same character as reference, face/headshot, short black messy hair, round brown eyes downcast with sadness, slight moisture in eyes trying not to cry, sad frown, looking down or away, tanned skin, bandaid visible, hoodie, soft melancholic lighting, anime/cel-shaded, preserve identity, focus on vulnerable sad expression showing insecurity about intelligence
expressions.negative_prompt: smiling, cheerful, angry, exaggerated crying streams, confident, formal clothes, text, watermark, bad anatomy, blurry

expressions.expression_label: 決意（挑戦・ロボコン本番）
expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Akasaka Mina same character as reference, face/headspot, short black messy hair, round brown eyes burning with determination and fighting spirit, confident strong smile, eyebrows furrowed in resolve, fist clenched suggested in lower frame, tanned skin, bandaid visible, work shirt or hoodie, strong lighting, anime/cel-shaded, preserve identity, focus on determined craftsman expression showing unwavering will to succeed
expressions.negative_prompt: sad, uncertain, sleepy, weak eyes, formal clothes, text, watermark, bad anatomy, blurry

expressions.expression_label: 大笑い（成功・仲間と喜び）
expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Akasaka Mina same character as reference, face/headshot, short black messy hair bouncing with movement, round brown eyes closed or squinted in laughter, huge open-mouth laugh showing pure joy, head thrown back slightly, tanned skin with oil smudges, bandaid visible, hoodie, warm cheerful lighting, high-detail anime illustration, preserve identity, focus on genuine unrestrained laughter showing pure happiness and camaraderie
expressions.negative_prompt: sad, serious, calm, sleepy, crying, formal clothes, clean perfect appearance, text, watermark, bad anatomy, blurry

workflow_recommendation.step1: First generate Mina_Neutral as the default reference image and save to 02_Characters/images/Mina/Mina_Default.png
workflow_recommendation.step2: Upload Mina_Default.png to NanoBananaPro as reference (Face ID / Character Ref enabled)
workflow_recommendation.step3: Set reference_strength to ~0.85 to lock identity (short black messy hair, round brown eyes, tanned skin, bandaids, energetic appearance)
workflow_recommendation.step4: Generate each expression with corresponding positive_prompt and negative_prompt; use 1:1 crop focusing on face
workflow_recommendation.step5: Adjust denoising_strength per expression: subtle changes (0.32-0.43), moderate (0.44-0.48), stronger emotional shifts (0.50)
workflow_recommendation.step6: Save outputs with suggested filenames: Mina_Neutral.png, Mina_Excited.png, Mina_Focused.png, Mina_Embarrassed.png, Mina_Frustrated.png, Mina_Sad.png, Mina_Determined.png, Mina_Laughing.png
workflow_recommendation.note: Mina is expressive and honest with emotions. She smiles and laughs easily. Key visual identifiers: messy bedhead hair, round energetic eyes, tanned skin, small bandaids (craftsman marks), oil smudges when working. Unlike the composed characters (Mai/Ai), Mina wears emotions openly.
